question: i merely want to know if this method in which the talaq was given is valid or not. "i am giving you your 1 talag, the 2nd one and the 3rd one" please advise.
answer:
QUESTION
this talaq was given telephonically in one sitting, with no witnesses present.it is the exact quotation of what was said, the validity of the talaq is in doubt , please advise, jazakallah.
ANSWER


Share:
If the husband issued three Talaaqs simultaneously or in different sittings,
the Nikah has irrevocably broken down.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
